paragraphs.content: Praise ye the LORD. Sing unto the LORD a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise ye the Lord. Sing unto the Lord a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.

paragraphs.content: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.

paragraphs.content: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.

paragraphs.content: For the LORD taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the Lord taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.

paragraphs.content: Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.

paragraphs.content: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, and a twoedged sword in their hand;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, and a twoedged sword in their hand;

paragraphs.content: To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and punishments upon the people;
paragraphs.contentHtml: To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and punishments upon the people;

paragraphs.content: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
paragraphs.contentHtml: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;

paragraphs.content: To execute upon them the judgment written: this honour have all his saints. Praise ye the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To execute upon them the judgment written: this honour have all his saints. Praise ye the Lord.
